description: In the pedestrian area of the town, with views of the Sile river from the ground floor, this attractive restaurant serves regional cuisine with a focus on local ingredients, prepared in a classic style attentive to modern tastes. There’s an excellent wine list, plus live music and a pleasant outdoor space for fine weather dining.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
